scripts.dev:all: npm run predev:all && (mongod --dbpath ./data/db --fork --logpath ./data/mongod.log || echo 'MongoDB already running or not installed, skipping...') && npm run dev
scripts.dev:all:docker: docker run -d --rm --name chat-mongo -p 27017:27017 -v $(pwd)/data/db:/data/db mongo || echo 'MongoDB already running, skipping...' && npm run dev
